casedk

Class HOSECodePredictor

  • java.lang.Object
    • casedk.HOSECodePredictor

  • public class HOSECodePredictor
extends java.lang.Object
    Predicts NMRS spectra by lookup of HOSE codes (Bremser, W., HOSE - A Novel Substructure Code, Analytica Chimica Acta, 1978, 103:355-365) parsed from a tab-separated value file, produced, for example, by the NMRShiftDBSDFParser tool provided in this package. The current version is hard coded to predict carbon spectra only.

    This Open Source Software is provided to you under the MIT License Refer to doc/mit.license or https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT for more information Copyright (c) 2017, Christoph Steinbeck

    Author:
    Christoph Steinbeck

      • verbose

        public boolean verbose

    • Constructor Detail

      • HOSECodePredictor

        public HOSECodePredictor(java.lang.String hoseTSVfile)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Initializes a HOSECodePredictor by reading HOSECodes and assigned shift values from from a tab-separated values (TSV) file, produced, for example, by the NMRShiftDBSDFParser tool provided in this package. Each line in the TSV file has the format

        String hosecode <\t>double shiftvalue

        Parameters:
        hoseTSVfile - tab-separated values (TSV) file with HOSECodes and assigned shift values
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception if TSV file cannot be read

      • HOSECodePredictor

        public HOSECodePredictor()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Initializes an empty HOSECodePredictor. Use readHOSECodeTable(String hoseTSVfile) to initialise. Each line in the TSV file has the format

        String hosecode <\t>double shiftvalue

        Parameters:
        hoseTSVfile - tab-separated values (TSV) file with HOSECodes and assigned shift values
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception if TSV file cannot be read
        java.lang.Exception

      • readHOSECodeTable

        public void readHOSECodeTable(java.lang.String hoseTSVfile)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads HOSE code table from TSV file. Without this, no prediction can be performed. Each line in the TSV file has the format

        String hosecode <\t>double shiftvalue

        Parameters:
        hoseTSVfile -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • predict

        public void predict(org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IAtomContainer ac)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Predicts NMR chemical shifts based on a given HOSE code table read by the Constructor of this class. The predicted chemical shifts are assigned to each atom by as a property of type CDKConstants.NMRSHIFT_CARBON. They are also written as CDKConstants.COMMENT to aid the DepictionGenerator class to generate a picture with shift annotations for all carbon atoms.
        Parameters:
        ac - The IAtomContainer for which to predict the shift values
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if something goes wrong.
